THIS REPORT ON FORM 6-K IS BEING FILED FOR THE
PURPOSE OF ADDING EXHIBITS
TO BANK OF MONTREAL’S REGISTRATION STATEMENT
ON FORM F-3 (FILE NO. 333-237342). THE
EXHIBITS TO THIS REPORT SHALL BE DEEMED TO BE
A PART OF SUCH REGISTRATION STATEMENT FROM THE
DATE ON WHICH THIS REPORT IS FILED, TO THE
EXTENT NOT SUPERSEDED BY DOCUMENTS OR REPORTS
SUBSEQUENTLY FILED.

shelf registration statement on Form F-3 (File
No. 333-237342), the registrant is filing the
exhibits set forth in the exhibit index below.
